I was then received by a woman who wordlessly took my ID and searched on a shelf for my package. After she had found it, she still held me a wordless sign under the nose and threw the ID back over the counter. After signing, she sat down again and I had to pull my package off the shelf behind the counter. Probably because she had only one hand free. In the other she held her cigarettes! This was also the reason why I and the package stank of smoke completely when I left the store ... I'll probably have the next time again deliver via DHL! Sincerely, xxx
